title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.25 - Additions to security officer lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.25 - Additions to security officer lists

State Regulations

An employer may file on commission forms to add a security
officer or supervisory security officer to a regular or extra list or fill a
vacancy thereon from employees who are available and qualified, in accordance
with sections 5.35 through
5.41
of this Part, inclusive. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
